You are here: SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ANALYTICS
Create custom report types so users can create reports about ideas, idea comments, and votes.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs)
Available in: Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create, update, and delete custom report types: Manage Custom Report Types

Create a custom report type for ideas. Create a new public folder for idea reports. Create one or more new custom reports for ideas. Assign the reports to the new idea reports folder.

Report on Salesforce Knowledge Articles
title: Create Custom Idea Reports in Salesforce
